databaseclasses-desc: Provides an object-oriented cache-enabled database interface for relational data
databaseclasses-exception-class-is-not-s: Class '$1' is not a subclass of '$2'
databaseclasses-exception-createobjects-: 'createObjects' property may only be set if 'className' is defined and 'type' is 'array'
databaseclasses-exception-delete-failed: Unable to delete from table '$1' with '$2' = '$3': $4
databaseclasses-exception-id-field-not-d: ID field '$1' not defined in fields property of database schema for class '$2'
databaseclasses-exception-id-value-must-: Primary key for class '$1' is an array of fields '$2'. Ids for this class must be an array of values with field names as keys (provided id '$3')
databaseclasses-exception-invalid-id-val: Invalid ID value array '$1' for class '$2'
databaseclasses-exception-junction-table: Many-to-many relationship '$1' does not define a junction table
databaseclasses-exception-nonautoincreme: Non-autoincrement ID field for class '$1' not defined. ID fields which do not use autoincrement must be defined directly or from generateNewIdValue() in their subclass
databaseclasses-exception-object-does-no: '$1' with '$2' = '$3' does not exist in the database
databaseclasses-exception-object-not-uni: Unique fields with [ $1 ] = [ $2 ] already exists in the in the database for '$3' with id '$4'
databaseclasses-exception-permission-den: Permission denied: User '$1' does not have '$2' rights for '$3' ($4)
databaseclasses-exception-primary-key-fi: Primary key field(s) '$1' in id '$2' for class '$3' are invalid
Primary key value missing for field(s) '$2' for class '$3'
databaseclasses-exception-properties-not: Static property $properties not defined for class '$1'
databaseclasses-exception-property-faile: Property '$1' for class '$2' with value '$3' failed validation
databaseclasses-exception-relatedpropert: Relationship '$1' defines relatedPropertyName '$2' which does not exist for relatedClassName '$2'
Relationship '$1' may not define relatedPropertyName unless relatedClassName is defined and references a subclass of '$2'
databaseclasses-exception-relationship-m: Property name must be a string for many-to-many relationships (provided '$1')
Related property name must be a string for many-to-many relationships (provided '$1')
Property name must be a string for many-to-one one-to-many relationships (provided '$1')
Related property name must be a string or an array for many-to-one one-to-many relationships (provided '$1')
databaseclasses-exception-relationship-n: Property '$1' for class '$2' must set source=DatabaseField::class when used in one-to-many or one-to-one relationship '$3'
Property '$1' for class '$2' must set source=DatabaseRelationship::class when used in many-to-many or many-to-one relationship '$3'
databaseclasses-exception-relationship-o: Property name must be a string or an array for many-to-one relationships (provided '$1')
Related property name must be a string for many-to-one relationships (provided '$1')
Property name must be a string or an array for one-to-one relationships (provided '$1')
Related property name must be a string or any array for one-to-one relationships (provided '$1')
databaseclasses-exception-relationship-p: Relationship property name '$1' not defined in properties for class '$2'
databaseclasses-exception-required-field: Required field(s) for class '$1' not defined: $2
databaseclasses-exception-right-not-defi: User right '$1' not defined in databaseclasses extension.json
databaseclasses-exception-schema-not-def: Static property $schema not defined for class '$1'
databaseclasses-exception-type-mismatch: Type mismatch: Value for property '$1' in class '$2' must be of type '$3' ('$4' provided)
databaseclasses-exception-unique-field-n: Unique field '$1' not defined in fields property of database schema for class '$2'
